snippet.title: Game Boy Color Longplay [084] Conkers Pocket Tales
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: NPI

The first Conker game!

Two years before the events of Bad Fur Day, Conker celebrates his birthday, but the Evil Acorn steals his presents and kidnaps Berri, his girlfriend. Conker's goal is to retrieve the presents and rescue Berri.

I have collected all of the presents and all but one invitation (I really don't know where it is). It doesn't matter tho, except for the ranking at the end. I got the Birthday Bonanza rank (the highest next rank is whole shebang). -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
